ingredients: 4  fresh figs,   +   1/2 cup pine nuts, 4  peaches, halved and pitted,   +   1/4 cup white sugar, 1 cup white wine,   +   1/2 cup brandy
nutrition: Total Fat 4g 6%, Saturated Fat 1g 4%, Sodium 4mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 16g 6%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 14g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 22mg 108%, Calcium 20mg 2%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 148mg 3%
